name: Ioroi
desc: A bake-danuki, who was sealed in a statue by Kamuna Harunosuke.

customize.name: "Kichiboushi"
customize.desc: A little tanuki from Chinju Forest. Ioroi plans to pass the titles of "Bake-Danuki King" and "Protector of the Grove" to him.

customize.name: Kitsune Saiguu
customize.desc: A Kitsune from the Hakushin clan, who was worshiped as a kitsune goddess. She died 500 years ago during the Cataclysm.

customize.text: The Kakushigami of the bake-danuki was Kitsune Saiguu's friend and rival. When the

customize.name: Khaenri'ahn cataclysm
customize.desc: A disaster that occurred 500 years ago. The Abyss was released into Teyvat and Khaenri'ah was destroyed.

customize.text: started 500 years ago, she offered him to play hide-and-seek so he wouldn't be harmed. However, she didn't come back and died from the Abyssal corruption. Ioroi still doesn't know his friend died.

customize.name: Kamuna Harunosuke
customize.desc: The creator of the Mystic Onmyou Chamber, who lived about 500 years ago.

customize.text: When Kitsune Saiguu did not return, Ioroi began to wreak havoc around himself in order to lure his friend out. He stole the ward needed to purify the Sacred Sakura, thinking it was an ordinary comb. For this, the Shogun sent Kamuna Harunosuke to deal with Ioroi, who turned the bake-danuki king and the other tanuki of the forest into stone.

customize.name: Toki Alley Tales (Prologue)
customize.desc: They say that in the past, when the fragile and short-lived mortals had yet to cross over the sea unto these lands, Inazuma was once a land that belonged to the tanuki. They say, too, that human history began as drunken tanuki nonsense... Welcome to Toki Alley, a place where history and wild tales intertwine.

customize.name: Ioroi's Ward
customize.desc:
A ward given to you by the bake-danuki Ioroi as a sign of thanks. It is shaped like a lovely comb.
Ioroi once stole this comb to lure "that sneaky kitsune" out. As punishment, Ioroi and his companions were sealed into graven stone by "that dratted fellow."
According to Kazari, these wards are needed to conduct the Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>August 26, 2021</color>
Only the shadow of the days of yore and empty dreams remain. Meanwhile, the hearts of mortals weigh heavy with eternal loneliness.
<color=#ff9999>YouTube:</color>

<color=#ffd780>May 19, 2023</color>
Up hill and dale, by the light of the stars and moon, the soft patter of Kirara's paws never ceases. The stunning scenery she passes and the smiles of her customers are what she truly treasures in her work.
<color=#ff9999>YouTube:</color>

value.name: Chinju Forest
value.desc:
Abode of Dwelling Demons

Legend has it that this sacred forest was once home to many demons.
